description.author:
Milan Straka <fox@ucw.cz>
Johan Tibell <johan.tibell@gmail.com>
description.synopsis: A class for types that can be converted to a hash value
description.description:
This package defines a class, 'Hashable', for types that
can be converted to a hash value.  This class
exists for the benefit of hashing-based data
structures.  The package provides instances for
basic types and a way to combine hash values.

package-flags.name: integer-gmp
package-flags.description: Are we using integer-gmp to provide fast Integer instances?

package-flags.name: fixed-salt
package-flags.description: Do we use a single fixed salt every time the program runs?

package-flags.name: sse2
package-flags.description: Do we want to assume that a target supports SSE 2?

package-flags.name: sse41
package-flags.description: Do we want to assume that a target supports SSE 4.1?
